action.primary: Breaks up Blood Stasis and unblocks menstruation

indications: Traumatic injury, irregular menstruation, postpartum abdominal pain due to Wind-Dampness

action.primary: Clears Heat, cools the Blood and stops bleeding

contraindications: Do not use for spotting or brown colored Blood.
Use with caution for those with Spleen and Stomach Deficiency Cold.

notes: This herb powerfully aborts the fetus.
It stops metrorrhagia due to Blood Stasis or Blood Heat.
